column1: '''''Vinyar Tengwar''''' '''6''' is the sixth issue of ''[[Vinyar Tengwar]]'', a journal of the  [[Elvish Linguistic Fellowship]], devoted to the scholarly study of the invented languages of  [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].
* "Essitalmar: Context, Context, Context ..." (column) — edited by [[Tom Loback]].
* "A Brief Note on the Background of the Letter from J.R.R. Tolkien to Dick Plotz Concerning the Declension of the High-elvish Noun" — [[Jorge Quiñonez]].
** '''The above article is previously unpublished primary material from the Tolkien archives.'''
::''The content list above only contains published articles.''
